content.webTitle: Five-year-old boy dies on skiing holiday

fields.headline: Five-year-old boy dies on skiing holiday
fields.bodyText: A five-year-old boy from London has died after being buried under snow at a Spanish ski resort. The Foreign Office said the child, Freddy Nicholls, died on Tuesday after spending 11 days in the intensive care unit at a hospital in Toulouse, France. He had become buried in snow that was being moved by a snow plough at the resort of Baqueira Beret, near Lleida, in the Spanish Pyrenees on 25 February. Emergency services took him to Vielha hospital before he was transferred to Purpan hospital, across the border in France. The boy, who has a Spanish mother and British father, was a Spanish national. Spanish authorities are investigating.
